race.name: UCI Gravel World Championships
race.tagline: UCI World Championship—180km elite, rainbow jersey, fastest field in gravel, rotating locations.

vitals.date_specific: Check UCI website for date and location

terrain.surface: 70% gravel, 30% paved roads. Varies by location. 2024 Heerlen (Netherlands)—rolling terrain, technical sections. 2022-2023 Italy—strade bianche. 180 km elite, 140 km age group. 2,500 m elevation (elite). Technical rating: 4/5.

gravel_god_rating.tier_override_reason: UCI World Championship - prestige=5 allows T2→T1 promotion

biased_opinion.summary: UCI Gravel World Championships is World Championship—180 km elite, 140 km age group. Founded 2022. 70% gravel, 30% paved. Rotating locations (2022-2023 Italy, 2024 Netherlands). 1,000+ riders (elite + age group). October autumn conditions (10-20°C, 40% rain). UCI license required (€100-€150 / $110-$165). If you want World Championship rainbow jersey and fastest field in gravel, this is it. If you need domestic/local race, skip it. International destination, prestige 5.
strengths: Fastest field in gravel (van der Poel, Vos, Vermeersch, Ferrand-Prévot)
biased_opinion.bottom_line: UCI Gravel Worlds is World Championship. 180 km elite, rainbow jersey, fastest field in gravel. If you want World Championship prestige and UCI license, this is it. If you need domestic/local, skip it. International travel required but World Championship makes it worth it. Elite + age group categories.

black_pill.title: 180KM + WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP FIELD + OCTOBER WEATHER
black_pill.reality: 180 km elite is brutal. World Championship field = fastest riders in gravel (van der Poel, Vos, Vermeersch, Ferrand-Prévot). October = 40% rain, 10-20°C, cold. 20-30% DNF (elite). UCI license required. International travel to rotating locations. You'll pay €100-€150 ($110-$165) + international travel. If you need domestic/local, this isn't it. If you want World Championship rainbow jersey, this is it. Brutal but prestigious.
black_pill.expectation_reset: UCI Gravel Worlds is World Championship. 180 km elite, fastest field, October weather. If you need domestic/local, skip it. If you want World Championship rainbow jersey and prestige 5, this is it. UCI license required. International travel but World Championship experience is worth it.

logistics.nearest_airport: Varies by location. 2024 Heerlen: Maastricht (MST) or Düsseldorf (DUS) — 30-50 km
logistics.travel_summary: Rotating locations. Check UCI website for current year location. International travel required. Book flights and lodging early. Multi-day expo. Race October. World Championship podium ceremony.
logistics.food_options: Aid stations on course. World Championship expo and post-race ceremony.

course_description.character: 180 km elite, 140 km age group. 70% gravel, 30% paved. Varies by location. Technical rating: 4/5.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: World Championship Pace
suffering_zones.description: Fastest field in gravel. World Championship level racing. Elite pace is brutal.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Pace conservatively. World Championship field is fast. Focus on finishing. Elite = 180 km long.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: October Weather
suffering_zones.description: October = 40% rain, 10-20°C. Cold + wet = hypothermia risk.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Full waterproofs. Layers. Manage cold/wet. Hypothermia prevention critical.

suffering_zones.name: Mile 140+: Elite Distance Fatigue
suffering_zones.description: 40 km to go. Legs gone. Mental game critical. 20-30% DNF here.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Break into chunks. Focus on next aid. Mental toughness. Push through.

course_description.signature_challenge: 180 km elite + World Championship field + October weather. Rainbow jersey.

history.origin_story: UCI Gravel World Championships founded 2022. Inaugural: Veneto, Italy. 2023: Vicenza, Italy. 2024: Heerlen, Netherlands. Rotating locations. Elite + age group. Rainbow jersey.
history.reputation: UCI World Championship. Fastest field in gravel. Rainbow jersey. Elite + age group. Rotating international locations.
